job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Job DescriptionltbrgtRequired Skillsltbrgt	Ideal candidate should have a degree in a quantitative field eg mathematics computer science physics economics engineering statistics operations research quantitative social science etcltbrgt	Basic Knowledge on software development principles and architectureltbrgt	Good analytical and problemsolving abilitiesltbrgt	Ability to break down and understand complex business problems define a solution and implement it using advanced quantitative methodsltbrgt	Familiarity with programming for data analysis ideally Python SQL or Rltbrgt	Solid oral and written communication skills especially around analytical concepts and methodsltbrgt	Great work ethic and intellectual curiosityltbrgt	Knowledge of Cloud technologies such as AWS or Google Cloudltbrgt	Knowledge of any relational database such as My SQLltbrgt	Must be a team player with excellent communication and problemsolving skills and have experience working with customers across teamsltbrgt
